casebody.data:
Eric Alan ISAACSON, Objector-Below, Appellant,
v.
Gordon NIEDERMAYER, and Brent Reed, Plaintiffs-Below, Appellee,
and
Steven A. Kriegsman, Louis J. Ignarro, Joseph Rubinfeld, David J. Haen, John Y. Caloz, Anita J. Chawla, Eric J. Selter as Representative for the Estate of Marvin R. Selter, Defendants Below, Appellees,
and
Cytrx Corporation, Nominal Defendant Below, Appellee. No. 306, 2018 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: December 12, 2018
Decided: December 26, 2018

AFFIRMED.
